pr_title: Add a warning for potentially needless use of setSecretKey

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                "that supports keyStore functionality.  Consider not doing this, as it only exists" +
          
          
            
                                "that supports keyStore functionality.  Consider not doing this, as it only exists " +
timeline.author: AdamBJohnsonx

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        Logger.warn(":setSecretKey", "You're using setSecretKey in a version of android" +
          
          
            
                        Logger.warn(":setSecretKey", "You're using setSecretKey in a version of android " +
timeline.author: AdamBJohnsonx
AdamBJohnsonx

timeline.bodyText: and are we doing this right now?
timeline.author: shahzaibj

replies.bodyText:
We support generating our own key, it happens here:

  
    
      microsoft-authentication-library-common-for-android/common/src/main/java/com/microsoft/identity/common/adal/internal/cache/StorageHelper.java
    
    
         Line 666
      in
      9a09e2e
    
    
    
    

        
          
           private synchronized KeyPair generateKeyPairFromAndroidKeyStore() 
        
    
  


From a customer investigation we were working on earlier, we found an app that was calling this method at startup: we suspect it's causing issues with SSO loss due to the host-app [potentially] providing mismatched keys
replies.author: iambmelt

replies.bodyText: Cool.....actually how does user defined key currently work for MSAL? It is only for ADAL right?
replies.author: shahzaibj
AdamBJohnsonx

replies.bodyText: Yeah but it has to be set on AuthenticationSettings.INSTANCE right? ADAL has a public method to do this...but I don't see one in MSAL
replies.author: shahzaibj

replies.bodyText:
This is ADAL: https://github.com/AzureAD/azure-activedirectory-library-for-android/blob/cfdb40c5d0fb28e4825df030e909bc493aaaffe9/adal/src/main/java/com/microsoft/aad/adal/AuthenticationSettings.java#L82
Is there something similar in MSAL?
replies.author: shahzaibj

timeline.message: Add a warning for potentially needless use of setSecretKey.
